messages.title: Bridget Fox on track to WIN
messages.content: Bridget will deliver a better deal for Islington people

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Emily Thornberry appears more than a little rattled.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Most bookies back Ms Fox, Islington South could fall to the Liberal Democrats

leaflet.personalStatement: Bridget has lived in Islington for nearly 20 years. Bridget will always make our area her first priority.

politicalExperience.role: school governor, local councillor, trustee of a local charity

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrats, all at 1a Alwyne Road, London, N1 2GG

quotes.text: Popular... efficient and energetic Bridget Fox
...eyes will be on Lib Dem candidate Bridget Fox to win the seat.
[Emily Thornberry appears more than a little rattled.]
Islington South could fall to the Liberal Democrats
Bridget Fox is out knocking on doors every night, with a large team of volunteers

images.caption: Bridget Fox on track to win
